Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board

Class TriangleBoard

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.AbstractBoard
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.TriangleBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class TriangleBoard
extends AbstractBoard
Represent a triangle game board, one of the different shapes for the game. The triangle are right-angle and can be angled in 4 different position It extends Abstract Board to follow the board's construction.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int patternNumber  
    private java.util.List<java.util.List<Coordinates>> patterns
    Represent the coordinates of the patterns brought down to (0,0) patterns contains 4 different pattern which correspond to every shape of the right-angle triangle This is mainly used to verify if the layout is well formed, and thus if a placement or a movement is correct

    • patterns

      private final java.util.List<java.util.List<Coordinates>> patterns
      Represent the coordinates of the patterns brought down to (0,0) patterns contains 4 different pattern which correspond to every shape of the right-angle triangle This is mainly used to verify if the layout is well formed, and thus if a placement or a movement is correct
